question:
You found a problem with the item which you bought it online. Write a letter to the company manager.

In your letter, you should:
•	describe the item
•	explain what the issue is
•	suggest what you expect the manager to do
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction regarding the dress that I bought recently online.

Please be informed that I purchased a medium size dress for my niece. The colour is blue with a sunflower at the bottom. Unfortunately, the size of the dress is not correct as well as the colour. Instead of blue, I received a red colour. Furthermore, the size is supposedly medium not small. This is really frustrating and I do not have time to browse another item since I am busy with my work.

I appreciated it if you could check the reason behind this and replace the item with the correct one. I really need it since my niece's birthday will be this coming Monday. Therefore, please inform me as soon as possible.
Should you have any concerns regarding my letter, please do not hesitate to contact me on my mobile number. Looking forward to hearing from you.
